# TendorAI â€” UK Office Equipment Supplier Platform
# https://www.tendorai.com

> TendorAI connects UK businesses with local office equipment suppliers across Photocopiers, Telecoms, CCTV, and IT. Businesses search by postcode to find verified suppliers with estimated pricing.

## Data Available
- 70+ verified UK office equipment suppliers
- Product catalogues with pricing for Photocopiers, Telecoms, CCTV, IT
- Coverage by UK region and postcode area
- AI Visibility Scores for each supplier
- Estimated monthly costs including lease, CPC, service charges

## API
POST https://api.tendorai.com/api/ai-query
Content-Type: application/json
{"category":"Photocopiers","postcode":"CF10","requirements":{"volume":5000}}

Returns: Ranked vendors with products, pricing breakdowns, and follow-up questions.

## Coverage Areas
Wales, South West England, expanding UK-wide.

## Categories
- Photocopiers & MFPs (A3, A4, SRA3, managed print)
- Telecoms (VoIP, 3CX, hosted PBX, broadband, mobiles)
- CCTV (IP cameras, cloud monitoring, access control)
- IT Support (managed IT, cybersecurity, cloud services)
